ComicInfo.Title: All Roads Lead to (New) Rome Part 2
ComicInfo.Summary: Bruno is on the run, accused of the murder of dozens of people on the planet Thera. The only way to earn his freedom is to fight his way out of a blood-soaked Gladiator arena. But Detective Alia Sparrow and her hulking sidekick, Greta the Enforcer, know the truth behind the murders, and who really stands to gain from them. Conspiracy, androids, and hot chicks on motorcycles abound in this great new sci-fi series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2025-01-04 19:18:01. [CVDB131680]
ComicInfo.Letterer: Dennis Heisler, Dreamer Design, Robin Spehar
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Richard Horie, Tanya Horie, Tony Daniel
ComicInfo.Characters: Bruno Karloff, Crucifer, Detective Sparrow, Greta
